about_the_game:
Game Overview:

The Turning: Combat Challenge, is a 3rd person action combat game that takes place in a gladiatorial arena. Playing as Tal, the player will re-enact the final battle in Tim Fox’s Novel Scavenger Hunt. The player and enemy each start with a set of items that include a weapon, armor and a shield. Each item is unique and comes with a corresponding special ability. You will participate in a one-on-one duel to the death in order to secure your team’s position in the Tyrning. This game was made by four Drury University students using the Unreal Engine.

Features:

  • Interaction system that allows the player to mix and match with equipping different unique items
  • Five equippable items each with unique attributes and special abilities
  • Combo attack system for the player
  • Intelligent enemy that can chase, attack, block and use special abilities.
  • Advanced Niagara and Cascade particle systems for VFX
  • Cool atmosphere with post processing, lighting, and animated crowd.
  • Informative and sleek HUD
  • Crisp UI that matches the atmosphere and aesthetic of the game
  • Settings for adjusting key bindings and audio
  • Custom artwork and models such as the arena and characters
  • Used assets and writing material that was given to us directly by author Tim Fox
  • Original music composition
  • System that changes the music based on the state of the game
  • Sound effects

content_descriptors.notes: There is blood, violence and one mild swear word.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 470 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The player, Tal, has been issued a combat challenge. Participate in a one-on-one duel to the death in order to secure your team’s position in the Tyrning. Using artifacts secured during previous hunts, engage in melee combat with the opposing team’s champion. Made by four Drury University students.
